data.name: button21.ToolTip
data.value:
WARNING: Pressing this button will delete all images stored on your harddrive in the "thumbs/Skin Fanart/music" folder and also from the fanart database.
The purpose of this button is to reset everything and allow for a complete new initial scrape.

data.name: button4.ToolTip
data.value: Press this button to enable or disable the use of the selected fanart/backdrop. Enabled means that the image will be used by the plugin in MediaPortal. Disabled means that MediaPortal will not use the image. The difference between pressing this button and the "Delete Selected Fanart" is that this button keeps the image on your harddrive but also in the fanart database and this also means that the scraper will NOT download it again. Pressing the delete button will delete the image but it can re-appear because the scraper can find the image on a future scrape.

data.name: button7.ToolTip
data.value: Press this button to enable or disable the use of the selected fanart/backdrop when displaying random images. This can be used to prevent for example violent content to be displayed as random images in basichome.

data.name: checkBoxThumbsDisabled.ToolTip
data.value: Check this opton if you have enabled the option "MP Artist Thumbs" or "MP Album Thumbs" above but does not want these images available when a skin puts random images as backdrops for example when selecting a menu like pictures. This option exists because some may think that artist thumb are of good enough quality when browsing the music collection but not good enough when displaying random music images for their music menu.

data.name: button2.ToolTip
data.value: Press this button to delete the selected fanart/backdrop from the fanart database but also from your harddrive. The difference between pressing this button and the "Enable/Disable Selected Fanart" button is that this button deletes the image from your harddrive and the fanart database and this saves harddisk space but the image can re-appear because the scraper can find the image on a future scrape.

data.name: checkBoxAspectRatio.ToolTip
data.value: Check this opton if you have only want the fanart handler to display wide images. Wide being images with aspect ratio equal or greater than 1.3 (like 16:10 and 16:9). This option is used together with the minimum pixels property. The minimum pixel property is validated first.

data.name: checkBoxEnableMusicFanart.ToolTip
data.value: Check this option to enable fanart for selected items anywhere in a skin when browsing your music collection. Like in myMusic plugin, music playlist, Music Videos or Last FM. Checking this option is highly recommended.

data.name: checkBoxXFactorFanart.ToolTip
data.value: Check this option if you want the fanart/backdrop images that you have donwloaded/created and put in the "/thumbs/Skin Fanart/music" folder or the fanart/backdrops that this plugin downloads (if scraper is enabled) to be used when you select a music artist/album/track in MediaPortal. Enabling this option is recommended.

data.name: comboBoxMinResolution.ToolTip
data.value: Select the minimum image resolution (quality) you want for fanart/backdrops/thumbs. Setting this to "0x0" will allow all images. If you have enabled "MP Artist Thumbs" or "MP Album Thumbs" you may want to leave this to "400x400" (because most of these thumbs are below "600x600" in resolution). This option is used together with the "Display Only Wide Images (Aspect Ratio >= 1.55)" property.

data.name: button3.ToolTip
data.value:
WARNING: Pressing this button will delete all images stored on your harddrive in the "thumbs/Skin Fanart/music" folder and also from the fanart database.
The purpose of this button is to reset everything and allow for a complete new initial scrape.

data.name: button1.ToolTip
data.value: Press this button to enable or disable the use of the selected fanart/backdrop when displaying random images. This can be used to prevent for example violent content to be displayed as random images in basichome.

data.name: button22.ToolTip
data.value: Press this button to delete the selected fanart/backdrop from the fanart database but also from your harddrive. The difference between pressing this button and the "Enable/Disable Selected Fanart" button is that this button deletes the image from your harddrive and the fanart database and this saves harddisk space but the image can re-appear because the scraper can find the image on a future scrape.

data.name: checkBoxEnableScraperMPDatabase.ToolTip
data.value:
Check this option if you want this plugin to automatically search the internet site www.htbackdrops.com for fanart/backdrops mathing all the artists that you have allready in your MediaPortal music database and then downloading the found images to your harddrive (to the "thumbs/Skin Fanart/music" folder). Leaving this option unchecked will disable scraping and you will have to manually add your fanart images to the "thumbs/Skin Fanart/music" folder.
Warning; Using this option if you have a large music collection can use quite alot of harddisk space.

data.name: button42.ToolTip
data.value:
WARNING: Pressing this button will delete all images stored on your harddrive in the "thumbs/Skin Fanart/music" folder and also from the fanart database.
The purpose of this button is to reset everything and allow for a complete new initial scrape.

data.name: checkBoxThumbsArtist.ToolTip
data.value: Check this option if you want the artist thumbnail images that MediaPortal automatically downloads for an artist to be used when you select a music artist/album/track in MediaPortal. These images are often in low resolution (=bad quality) but setting the "Minimum Resolution For Images" option can solve this problem.

data.name: checkBoxThumbsAlbum.ToolTip
data.value: Check this option if you want the album thumbnail images that MediaPortal automatically downloads for an albun to be used when you select a music artist/album/track in MediaPortal. These images are often in low resolution (=bad quality) but setting the "Minimum Resolution For Images" option can solve this problem.

data.name: checkBoxScraperMusicPlaying.ToolTip
data.value:
Check this option if you want this plugin to automatically search the internet site www.htbackdrops.com for fanart/backdrops mathing every song you play in MediaPortal and then downloading the found images to your harddrive (to the "thumbs/Skin Fanart/music" folder). Leaving this option unchecked will disable now playing scraping and you will have to manually add your fanart images to the "thumbs/Skin Fanart/music" folder.
Warning; Using this option if you have a large music collection can use quite alot of harddisk space.

data.name: button41.ToolTip
data.value: Press this button to delete the selected fanart/backdrop from the fanart database but also from your harddrive. The difference between pressing this button and the "Enable/Disable Selected Fanart" button is that this button deletes the image from your harddrive and the fanart database and this saves harddisk space but the image can re-appear because the scraper can find the image on a future scrape.

data.name: button20.ToolTip
data.value: Press this button to enable or disable the use of the selected fanart/backdrop when displaying random images. This can be used to prevent for example violent content to be displayed as random images in basichome.
